anime.description: Welcome to the concrete jungle, where it`s a struggle to survive among the animals of the city. Watch Jake the bear, his girlfriend Jenny the cat, and a bunch of their slightly crazy friends and co-workers as they live, love and try to stay sane in a wild world. Source: Official website

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: comedy
tag.description: Anime whose central struggle causes hilarious results. These stories are built upon funny characters, situations and events. A comedy anime is laced with humour and sets out to provoke laughter from the audience. Japanese humour can be a bit strange to westerners, so if you`re new to this type of humour, just bear with it; it`ll most likely grow on you if you`re a fan of other kinds of comedy.

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

episode.title: ジェニーはご機嫌ななめ
Jenny`s Cat Flap
Jenny wa Gokigen Naname
episode.summary: Jake and Jenny destroy the house in a raging fight. Jake comes up with a desperate plan to calm Jenny down… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: がんばれジェイク!
Give It Your All, Jake!
Ganbare Jake!
episode.summary: Jake decides to marry Jenny, his girlfriend of two years. But will the indecisive bear fumble the proposal? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: フレッドの遍歴
Better off Fred
Fred no Henreki
episode.summary: The guys are watching a baseball game at the stadium when Fred the rabbit decides to show off photos of all 25 of his kids. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ザックの秘密
The Book of Zac
Zac no Himitsu
episode.summary: On the outside, Zack seems to have it all, and he’s Jake’s personal hero. But, at home he’s not the tough guy he pretends to be. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: もてもてセレーナ
Selena Loves Nuts
Motemote Selena
episode.summary: Selena’s the popular girl at the office, although she’s in love with her boyfriend, Justin. But when Justin unexpectedly proposes, Selena goes nuts. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: あきらめない男 ニコラス
Nicolas Is Not So Great
Akiramenai Otoko Nicolas
episode.summary: Jenny runs into her obnoxious ex, Nicholas, at the café. Later on, Jake and Nicholas hit it off, oblivious that they’re after the same girl. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ローザは泣かない
War of the Rosa
Rosa wa Nakanai
episode.summary: Rosa’s an ace in the office, but she’s got lousy luck with men. At the café, Rosa tells the girls about her ex Andrew’s weird mother obsession. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ジェイクとジェニーの長い一日
Jake & Jenny One More Time
Jake to Jenny no Nagai Ichinichi
episode.summary: This year, Jake actually seems to have everything set up for a perfect anniversary date. But, when a freak elevator accident ruins it all, will Jenny believe it`s not his fault? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ウィルの記念日
Will`s Testament
Will no Kinenbi
episode.summary: Our alcoholic narrator, Will, spends one day a year sober, hoping to meet a lost love he`s been waiting on for 15 years. Will she finally come back into his life this year? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: アンドリューとママ
Mother Lovin` Andrew
Andrew to Mama
episode.summary: Rosa accidentally downloads an embarrassing virus and can`t print out documents for an important meeting. Her ex, Andrew the computer wiz, saves the day in the nick of time. Will Rosa fall in love with him again? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夢見るミシェル
My Name Is Michelle
Yumemiru Michelle
episode.summary: Shy girl Michelle is tired of being the office wisp. Jenny reluctantly gives Michelle advice on getting popular and finding love, but will Michelle take it too far? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 狩人ベス
Apocalypse Beth
Kariudo Best
episode.summary: The guys get stuck going on a business trip to Guam with Beth. When the guys realize Beth is going to choose one of them to pounce on, they agree to take turns keeping watch all night… Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: クロエとデビット
Dear David, Love Chloe
Chloe to David
episode.summary: David’s worried his wife will find out about his not-so-secret office affair with Chloe, and wants to cut it off. But Chloe has other plans. Source: crunchyroll
